name: Nooch III: Saigo no Seisen
overview: The mystery of Nooch enters its final phase. Umechiyo and his sweetheart, the genius girl Piliru from the fictional country Paru, are relaxing on the beach when news of another conspiracy surface. The remnants of the Gilbert organization are not willing to give up, and are seeking for a powerful ancient Egyptian artifact. The two heroes must unveil the mystery before their antagonists do. Nooch III: Saigo no Seisen is the third entry of the Nooch series, and a sequel to Nooch II: Revenge of Remy. Gameplay-wise, it is similar to its predecessors, utilizing standard Japanese-style menu-based interaction and still screens representing locations. However, it also features segments with top-down third-person navigation, which were not present in the previous entries.
